title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 6 categories of Country on the x axis representing 2 groups: Mobile market, and Fixed market.
Averaging these 2 groups, the highest category is found for Country Germany with a mean value of 27.5.
Followed by South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) with a mean value of 23.15.
The lowest category is observed at United Kingdom that has a mean value of 14.05
showing a difference of 64.7% with the maximum value.
In case of South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Mobile market shows more dominance than any other Country and it has the lowest value in Spain.
